short_description: CentOS with Xfce desktop environment (via noVNC) and CPU-only support
endpoints: { "name": "VNC web", "nginx": {"port": "8080", "additional" : "proxy_set_header X-Forwarded-For ${CP_DOLLAR}proxy_add_x_forwarded_for;proxy_set_header X-Real-IP ${CP_DOLLAR}remote_addr;proxy_set_header Host ${CP_DOLLAR}http_host;proxy_http_version 1.1;proxy_redirect off;proxy_buffering off;proxy_set_header Upgrade ${CP_DOLLAR}http_upgrade;proxy_set_header Connection \"upgrade\";proxy_read_timeout 86400;" }, "isDefault": false }
